Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.messages.clientToServerMessages

Class SocketClientGenericMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.messages.clientToServerMessages.SocketClientGenericMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SocketClientMessageCreateGame, SocketClientMessageDrawCardDisplayed, SocketClientMessageDrawCardFromDeck, SocketClientMessageJoinFirstGame, SocketClientMessageJoinSpecificGame, SocketClientMessageLeaveGame, SocketClientMessageNewChatMessage, SocketClientMessagePing, SocketClientMessagePlaceCardOnCodex, SocketClientMessagePlaceStarterOnCodex, SocketClientMessageReconnectToGame, SocketClientMessageSelectCardObjective, SocketClientMessageSetGameSize
public abstract class SocketClientGenericMessage extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing a generic message sent from the client to the server. This class serves as a base for different types of messages that can be sent, each with specific actions when executed.
